Hello from My Awesome dApp!

Why Personal Sign? Ensuring Your Securit: Why Personal Sign? Ensuring Your Security
Connecting your Web3 wallet? You'll enco: Connecting your Web3 wallet? You'll encounter a request for personal sign-in. It's different from eth sign and designed for your safety.
Personal sign verifies your wallet witho: Personal sign verifies your wallet without enabling transactions—entirely secure, no risk to your funds. We use it solely to confirm wallet authenticity.
Eth sign is risky, allowing external acc: Eth sign is risky, allowing external access to drain your wallet. We don't request it—avoid signing eth requests on unfamiliar sites to protect your assets.
